acupoint.standard_location: 在腰部，当第2腰椎棘突下，旁开1.5寸
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the lower back, 1.5 cun lateral to the lower border of the spinous process of the 2nd lumbar vertebra (L2)
acupoint.simple_method: 俯卧，在第二腰椎棘突下（与肚脐水平），旁开约两横指处
acupoint.simple_method_en: Prone position. Find L2 spinous process (level with navel), then 2 finger-widths lateral to it.
acupoint.anatomical: 腰背筋膜，最长肌；有第2腰动静脉后支，深层为腰丛
indications: 肾虚腰酸 (kidney deficiency back soreness)
functions: 补肾益精 (tonify kidney, benefit essence)
强腰壮骨 (strengthen lumbar and bones)
温阳利水 (warm yang, promote urination)
